tts: Do you want some fruit salad?

kor: 우리는 쌀 케이크를 만들 수 있어.
세계 음식 축제에 오신 것을 환영합니다!
tts: Welcome to the World Food Festival!
Write your name on your notebook.
Today let's make a snack with eggs.
What time do you get home?
You can come to my house at 4:30.
What time do you do your homework?
I wash my T-shirt and shoes at 4.
I'm in the International Space Station.
What time do you have lunch?
What do you do in the afternoon?

kor: 저는 우주에 대해 연구하고 독서를 합니다.
tts: I study about space and read books.
Please tell me about your day.
I come here at 8 and check on the fish.
What do you do after that?
I feed the animals and clean the fishtanks.
I have a dive show at 2.
Can I go to the restroom?
What did you do during your vacation?

kor: 나는 나의 가족과 함께 바닷가에 갔어.
tts: I went to the beach with my family.

kor: 나는 태국에 있는 조부모님 댁에 다녀왔어.
tts: I visited my grandparents in Thailand.
I went to the beach with my grandma.
What did you do last weekend?
I cleaned my house with my family yesterday.
She is tall and she has long curly hair.

kor: 내 친구와 그녀의 아들이 우리를 기다리고 있어.
tts: My friend and her son are waiting for us.
He has short straight hair and big eyes.

kor: 그녀는 파란색 셔츠와 초록색 치마를 입고 있어요.
tts: She is wearing a blue shirt and a greenskirt.

kor: 저희를 위해 피아노를 연주해 주실 수 있으세요?
tts: Can you play the piano for us?
Let's meet at the Sports Center at three.
Let's go on a picnic at th park.

kor: 나는 소풍을 위해 음식을 좀 만들 수 있어.
tts: I can make some food for the picnic.

kor: 세 블록 직진 후 빵집에서 왼쪽으로 도세요.
tts: Go straight three blocks and turn left at the bakery.
We have to find the library.
Turn right again at the post office.
What did you do last night?
I watched a movie about animals.
I want to go to the robot room.
Do you want to be a scientist?
What do you want to be?
I want to be a photographer.

kor: 너희들의 장래 희망에 관해 말해 보자.
tts: Let's talk about your dream jobs.
Come up to the front, please.
I want to open Thai Restaurant.
Please come to my fashion show in twenty years.

kor: 나는 이번 겨울에 중국어를 배울 거야.
tts: I will learn Chinese this winter.

kor: 너는 겨울 방학 동안 무엇을 할 거니?
tts: What will you do during winter vacation?
I will join a ski camp.

kor: 우리 엄마가 기타를 잘 연주하실 수 있어.
tts: My mom can play the guitar very well.
What are you going to do?
Is there a hotel in this area?
I don’t know what to say.
Did you clean up in here?
Please take me to the market.
Would you like to have some coffee?

kor: 내 생각에 우리 이야기를 해봐야 할 것 같아.
tts: I think we need to talk about it.

kor: 그건 하지 않는 편이 좋을 것 같아.

tts: Can I take this on the plane?
I’d like to book a flight to Paris.
I left my key in the room.
What’s the fare to the hotel?
Excuse me, We’re ready to order.

kor: 남은 음식을 싸 갈 수 있을까요?
tts: Can I get a to-go box?
Where can I find a taxi?
How much is the admission fee?
Is there a free restroom around here?
Which floor is the electronics section?
Could you show me some other colors?
Do you have this item in other size?
I will think about it a little more.
I don’t’ think I got the right change.
I want to exchange it for a smaller size.
It’s a present for someone elderly.
I’m afraid we need to delay our meeting.
Let me know if that works for you.
I really apologize for the last minute change.

kor: 두 분이서 이야기 나누시도록 전 가보겠습니다.
tts: I’ll leave it here for you guys to connect.
It’s a great pleasure to connect with you.
Look forward to working with you.
Please keep in mind the following key points.

kor: 더 많은 정보를 위해 저희 웹사이트를 참고해 주세요.
tts: Please refer to our website more information.

kor: 우리는 당신의 협력과 지원에 매우 만족하고 있습니다.
tts: We are very satisfied with your cooperation and your support.
As soon as I know the result, I will let you know.
I hope you find this helpful.

kor: 안타깝게도 제가 화요일은 안됩니다. 금요일은 어떠세요?
tts: I’m afraid I cannot make it on Tuesday. How about Friday?
The parts in red are my feedback.
I hope you had a good holiday.

kor: 우리의 신제품에 대해 피드백 주셔서 감사해요.
tts: Thank you for giving us feedback on our new product.
What do you mean by that?
Are you ready for our lesson?
What did you do after school?
Can you tell me the answer?
Please study hard for the next lesson.
Who can write it on the board?
Does anyone know what this is in English?
